title: Remote Phone Receptionist - Full Time
job_overview:
Join our remote team as a Phone Receptionist, handling inbound calls for clients across the US. Your role will be to answer 100% of incoming calls—calls will ring to all receptionists, and the first to answer will take the call. This position is full-time from the start.

What You’ll Do:
Answer incoming calls promptly and professionally
Provide information, take messages, and route calls as needed
Deliver exceptional service and represent our clients well on every call
Work as part of a distributed team ensuring 24/7 coverage (primarily 6am-7pm US time)

Schedule:
Shifts may rotate—must be flexible to cover mornings, afternoons, or weekends as required

Qualifications:
Excellent English communication skills, both spoken and written
Reliable, fast internet and quiet workspace
Experience as a receptionist, call center agent, or similar role is a plus
Highly dependable, responsive, and able to work independently

Why Join Us?
100% remote/work from home
Full-time hours
Friendly, supportive team

How to Apply:
Send your CV and a short voice recording introducing yourself (1-2 mins) explaining why you’re a great fit for a receptionist role.
